1 #include <multi_robot_controller/feed_forward/ros_orientation_feed_forward_base.h>

3 RosOrientationFeedForwardBase::RosOrientationFeedForwardBase(ros::NodeHandle &nh): nh_(nh),
4  tf_listener_(tf_buffer_),
5  enable_(false)
6 {
7  ros::NodeHandle priv("~");
8  this->tf_buffer_.setUsingDedicatedThread(true);
9  this->init_service_=priv.advertiseService("enable",&RosOrientationFeedForwardBase::initServiceCallback,this);
10  this->enable_service_=priv.advertiseService("disable",&RosOrientationFeedForwardBase::disableServiceCallback,this);
11 }
12 
13 bool RosOrientationFeedForwardBase::init()
14 {
15  double rate;
16  ros::NodeHandle nh("~");
17 
18  nh.getParam("tf_prefix",this->tf_prefix_);
19 
20  bool lookup_offset=false;
21  if(nh.getParam("lookup_offset",lookup_offset))
22  {
23  std::string off_source_frame,off_target_frame;
24  if(!nh.getParam("off_target_frame",off_target_frame)||!nh.getParam("off_source_frame",off_source_frame))
25  {
26  ROS_WARN("Frames for offset lookup contain error!");
27  }
28  else
29  {
30  try{
31  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped offset_trafo=tf_buffer_.lookupTransform(tf::resolve(this->tf_prefix_,off_source_frame),
32  tf::resolve(this->tf_prefix_,off_target_frame),
33  ros::Time(0),
34  ros::Duration(10.0));
35  Pose offset;
36  convertMsg(offset,offset_trafo);
37  this->setOffset(offset);
38  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Set offset: \n"<<offset);
39  }
40  catch(tf2::TransformException &ex) {
41  ROS_WARN("Could NOT find trafo for offset lookup from %s to %s: %s",
42  off_source_frame.c_str(),
43  off_target_frame.c_str(), ex.what());
44  }
45  }
46  }
47  else
48  {
49  ROS_WARN("Did not load offset for feed forward!");
50  }
51  bool lookup_initial_pose;
52  if(nh.getParam("lookup_initial_pose",lookup_initial_pose))
53  {
54  std::string target_frame,source_frame;
55  if(!nh.getParam("ee_target_frame",target_frame)||!nh.getParam("ee_source_frame",source_frame))
56  {
57  ROS_WARN("Frames for offset lookup contain error!");
58  }
59  else
60  {
61  try
62  {
63  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped trafo=tf_buffer_.lookupTransform(tf::resolve(this->tf_prefix_,source_frame),
64  tf::resolve(this->tf_prefix_,target_frame),
65  ros::Time(0),
66  ros::Duration(10.0));
67  Pose initial;
68  convertMsg(initial,trafo);
69  this->setDesiredPose(initial);
70  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Set initial pose: \n"<<initial);
71  }
72  catch(tf2::TransformException &ex) {
73  ROS_WARN("Could NOT find trafo for initial lookup from %s to %s: %s",
74  source_frame.c_str(),
75  target_frame.c_str(), ex.what());
76  }
77  }
78  }
79  else
80  {
81  ROS_WARN("Did not load initial pose for feed forward!");
82  }
83  if(!nh.getParam("ee_pose_frame",this->ee_frame_id_))
84  {
85  ROS_WARN("Could not load frame id for feed forward pose!");
86  return false;
87  }
88  std::string pose_topic;
89  if(nh.getParam("pose_topic",pose_topic))
90  {
91  this->pose_pub_=this->nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>(pose_topic,10);
92  }
93 
94  if(nh.getParam("update_rate",rate))
95  {
96  this->update_timer_=this->nh_.createTimer(ros::Rate(rate),&RosOrientationFeedForwardBase::update,this);
97  }
98  else
99  {
100  throw NecessaryParamException("update_rate");
101  }
102  return true;
103 
104 }
105 bool RosOrientationFeedForwardBase::initServiceCallback(std_srvs::EmptyRequest &req,std_srvs::EmptyResponse &res)
106 {
107  this->init();
108  this->enable_=true;
109  return true;
110 }
111 bool RosOrientationFeedForwardBase::disableServiceCallback(std_srvs::EmptyRequest &req,std_srvs::EmptyResponse &res)
112 {
113  this->enable_=false;
114  return true;
115 }
